DOC.brief_summary: To define change whole body oxygen consumption occur follow major vascular surgery ( open aortic aneurysm surgery ; endovascular aortic aneurysm repair ; infra-inguinal low limb revascularisation procedure ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Post-operative Oxygen Consumption Following Vascular Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients present major vascular surgery Royal Infirmary Edinburgh Patient refusal
